title: Friendly, High Performing Real Estate Cold Caller
salary: $640/ Month Base + Weekly and Monthly Bonuses
job_overview:
Virtual Assistant Cold Caller – Real Estate (Full-Time | Long-Term)

Are you a confident English speaker with a friendly voice and excellent phone presence? Do you enjoy engaging with people and helping solve problems? If so, we’d love to have you on our team!

We are a fast-growing U.S.-based real estate investment company that specializes in buying residential properties. We’re looking for a professional, consistent, and driven Cold Caller VA who can help us connect with motivated homeowners. This is not for beginners or clock watchers. 
Position Details
Role: Virtual Assistant Cold Caller
Industry: Real Estate 
Employment Type: Full-Time (40+ hours/week)
Location: Remote (Philippines-based candidates only)
Working Hours: U.S. Eastern Standard Time (EST) – typically 9 AM to 6 PM EST (Bonus if you can work Saturdays) 
Salary: Competitive pay (based on experience) + performance bonuses

Your Responsibilities
Make outbound calls to property owners using our dialer (Ready Mode)
Follow scripts and qualify leads based on specific criteria
Input lead details and notes accurately into Close.io CRM
Schedule follow-up calls and set appointments for our acquisition team
Maintain professional and empathetic communication at all times
Collaborate with our team via Slack and manage daily tasks on Asana

What We’re Looking For
Excellent verbal and written English (neutral/clear accent preferred)
12+ months of outbound calling or sales experience in Real Estate 
Strong communication and listening skills
Self-motivated, consistent, and organized
Comfortable working independently and hitting daily/weekly KPIs
Understands how to build rapport and qualify using the 4 pillars: Motivation, Condition, Timeline, Price
Quiet environment, reliable internet, USB headset
Familiarity with tools like:
Ready Mode 
Close.io CRM
Slack, G-Suite, Batch Leads, Propstream, Asana

How to Apply
We want to hear how you sound on the phone! Please submit:
Your updated resume. 
An audio recording (MP3 or Vocaroo link) of you doing a 1-2 minute mock cold call as if you're speaking to a homeowner about selling their property. Be friendly, natural, and confident.
A brief introduction message telling us why you’re a great fit for this role.

Why Work With Us
Long-term opportunity with room to grow
Supportive and professional U.S. team
Training and onboarding provided
Monthly incentives and performance bonuses
A company culture that values respect, ownership, and growth

We’re hiring immediately – apply today and become a vital part of our growing team!
